TestCase_GC0011_FullTransparencyDarken ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
078A0000000000000000000000000006
Focus:
Ensure that displaying a fully transparent pixel does not darken the background
Test Steps:
Display a full screen white background. Then display an image with transparent pixels in a loop. After 256 iterations, the pixels that are transparent will appear as black if TBUG-915 is present, but will not be diplayed at all if TBUG-915 is fixed. The image is made such that the display reads "Test OK!" when TBUG-915 is fixed, but reads "Test FAILED!" when TBUG-915 is not fixed.
Manual Execution:
Yes
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
303A
Test ID:
TrustedUI.0700_TuiTester.GC0011_FullTransparencyDarken
